# Building a Modern Portfolio with Next.js Creating a portfolio website is essential for any developer. In this comprehensive guide, we'll build a modern, responsive portfolio using Next.js and Tailwind CSS. ## Why Next.js for Portfolios? Next.js provides several advantages for portfolio websites: - **SEO Optimization**: Server-side rendering improves search engine visibility - **Performance**: Automatic code splitting and optimization - **Easy Deployment**: Seamless deployment with Vercel - **Modern Features**: Built-in image optimization, API routes, and more ## Project Setup Let's start by creating a new Next.js project: ```bash npx create-next-app@latest my-portfolio cd my-portfolio npm install ``` ## Installing Dependencies We'll use several packages to enhance our portfolio: ```bash npm install tailwindcss @tailwindcss/postcss npm install framer-motion npm install react-icons npm install next-themes ``` ## Setting up Tailwind CSS Configure Tailwind CSS for styling: ```javascript // tailwind.config.js module.exports = { content: [ './pages/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}', './components/**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx}', ], darkMode: 'class', theme: { extend: { colors: { primary: '#3B82F6', secondary: '#1F2937', }, fontFamily: { sans: ['Inter', 'system-ui', 'sans-serif'], }, }, }, plugins: [], } ``` ## Creating the Layout ```jsx // components/Layout.js import Navbar from './Navbar' import Footer from './Footer' const Layout = ({ children }) => { return (

Loading...

, ssr: false }) ``` ## SEO Optimization ```jsx // pages/_app.js import Head from 'next/head' import { ThemeProvider } from 'next-themes' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import '../styles/globals.css' function MyApp({ Component, pageProps }) { return ( Your Name - Full Stack Developer ) } export default MyApp ``` ## Deployment Deploy your portfolio to Vercel: ```bash # Install Vercel CLI npm install -g vercel # Deploy vercel ``` ## Conclusion You now have a modern, responsive portfolio built with Next.js. Key features include: - Responsive design with Tailwind CSS - Dark mode support - Smooth animations with Framer Motion - SEO optimization - Performance optimizations - Easy deployment Continue customizing and adding your own projects to make it uniquely yours!
